name: GodChamber
description:
GodChamber is a Platformer with elements of FEZ-like puzzle-platforming and Metroidvania combat.

Help your friend the Chained Goddess get the two keys that will free her.

Created in 2 weeks for the LowRez Jam 2018. 

Programming, Environmental Art: Noah Gale 

Music: David Guo

Character Art and other things:

Large Skeleton: Calciumtrice

Armed Skeleton: Jesse M

Knight: Lionheart963

Main Character: Universal Pixel Warrior by Anton Karnomazov

Outline and Silhouette Shader: cakeslice

Controls:

X - action.

Arrow keys -  Movement, (Up, Down to move on ladders.)

Space Bar - Jump

A - Attack

Q, E, rotate the view Left, and Right, respectively.

Getting the resolution to fit in WebGL at 64x64 isn't 100%... but it's a 64x64 game in the editor...
